document_data.name: ''Powder of magical detection''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Powder of magical detection''''' was a type of [[magic]]al powder.
document_data.Description: This powder was extremely fine and consisted of minute, crystalline granules. They typically came in packets that contained around eleven to twenty pinches of the powder.
document_data.Powers: Whenever a mere pinch of this crystalline powder made contact with a [[magical item]], regardless of its size, it would spark and flash with a prismatic array of colors. Users could not discern from the powder the nature or intensity of an item's [[item enchantment|enchantment]], only that the item in question was magical.
document_data.Availability: * The [[Diviner's Guild]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] was known to sell ''powder of magic detection'' for around 4,650 [[gp]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/88/The Living City: The Ravens Bluff Diviner's Guild|16}}
